name: Drunk Moto Rider
description:
It's late and you need to take your motorbike home. How far can you get before crashing into grass?

Arrow key left/right or A/D to steer.

The procedurally generated road gets skinnier as you progress.

Made this for #stopwaitingforgodot, and also my first game with Godot (and also first game). Took about 8 hours from installing to completion.

Credits:

Song: THYKIER - Shimmer [NCS Release] Music provided by NoCopyrightSounds
Free Download/Stream: http://NCS.io/TShimmer

Bike Art: Racing Pack [Kenny] https://www.kenney.nl/assets/racing-pack
